name: Let's make some happy little clouds
description: All you have to do is let your imagination go wild. Now we can begin working on lots of happy little things. Use what happens naturally, don't fight it.

name: We all need friends
description: Paint anything you want on the canvas. Create your own world. Making all those little fluffies that live in the clouds. It's amazing what you can do with a little love in your heart. Even trees need a friend.

name: Remember how free clouds are.
description: Anything you want to do you can do here. Here's another little happy bush A tree cannot be straight if it has a crooked trunk.

name: A happy cloud
description: This is the time to get out all your flustrations, much better than kicking the dog around the house or taking it out on your spouse.
